Kup/Elita:

Kup continue chasing and shooting agaisnt Nightshift while elit=
a had woke up and walked towards the command center and walking towards Lor=
d Elder, and tried to climb a nearby chair hoping to see  what was goin on
=


From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Thursday, March 18, 2010 10:17 AM
To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Back to the Ark


  
> "I got it. All right.=
 Lord Elder, Kup, I want you to keep this channel open to Hydras, as things=
 unfold. He'll want to hear how the chase is going, and probably want to he=
ar Night Shift's act against me. That should spark some curiosity among him=
 or his comrades. With that said, it's go time."
>
> They transform into SU=
V modes and drive outside where Night Shift now turns from Autobot into Dec=
epticon. The chase begins quickly and furiously around the Ark, as Tucson t=
ries to lure Night Shift away.
>
> " Chase me all you want, you're not gett=
ing your hands on the Matrix!"

Lord Elder nodded as the two nearly twined =
Autobots, Tuscon and
Nightshift completed their plans and were ready to put=
 them into
action.

"I will stay here." he said, obviously still not comple=
tely convinced
that this plan would work, but was hopeful none the less. "B=
e
careful." He said as he stood and altered the shield so that it would
bur=
st open for Nightshift, as if he had just broken out instead of him
being l=
et out.

He glanced around for a moment as if he thought he heard something=
.

With a small shrug he brought the shield back to full strength and
resum=
ed his seat to watch the battle unfold via sensors and cameras
from the Ark=
.

(TAG)

Preston
